com.cyc.session

Interface SessionManager<T extends CycSession>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface SessionManager<T extends CycSession>
extends Closeable
    The SessionManager is responsible for managing the lifecycle of CycSessions, from configuration, to creation, to caching, to cleanup, and providing appropriate CycSessions to API and application code that requires them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getCurrentSession()
      Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread.

      Returns the current SessionManager instance.

      Returns the configuration for the current SessionManager.
      CycSessionConfiguration getSessionConfiguration()
      Returns a CycSessionConfiguration, suitable for creating a new CycSession.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether the SessionManager is closed.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        static SessionManager getInstance()
        Returns the current SessionManager instance.
        Returns:
        the current SessionManager

      • getCurrentSession

        T getCurrentSession()
             throws SessionConfigurationException,
                    SessionCommunicationException,
                    SessionInitializationException
        Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread. If no CycSession object currently exists, one will be created from a configuration drawn from getSessionConfiguration() and assigned to the local thread.
        Returns:
        a (possibly new) CycSession object for the current thread.
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException - if the application is not sufficiently configured for the CycConfigurationManager to connect to a Cyc server.
        SessionCommunicationException - if the application encounters problems communicating with a Cyc server.
        SessionInitializationException - if the application encounters problems initializing the CycSession.

      • getSessionConfiguration

        CycSessionConfiguration getSessionConfiguration()
                                         throws SessionConfigurationException
        Returns a CycSessionConfiguration, suitable for creating a new CycSession. The SessionManager will first retrieve an EnvironmentConfiguration based on the System properties, and then expanding any configuration directives it might contain; the result is returned by this method. The SessionManager may cache CycSessionConfigurations if it believes there is no possibility that they would have changed: for example, if the EnvironmentConfiguration directly specifies a CycAddress, and the relevant System properties have not changed.
        Returns:
        a new CycSessionConfiguration
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException

      • getManagerConfiguration

        SessionManagerConfiguration getManagerConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration for the current SessionManager.
        Returns:
        the configuration for the current SessionManager

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns whether the SessionManager is closed.
        Returns:
        whether SessionManager is closed
